name: Sgui
body:
sGUI
====

Unity3d GUI helper.
Current Version 1.2

[Download Package](https://github.com/sharbelfs/sGUI/raw/master/sGui-1.2.unitypackage)

[by FireHurricane](http://www.firehurricane.com/blog/sgui-unity3d-gui-helper/)

Assets thanks to [Kenney](http://www.kenney.nl)


![Screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sharbelfs/sGUI/master/extras/screenshot.png)

Features
====

Drag the prefab into the scene and configure as you like.

* GuiBase
* GuiBox
* GuiButton
* GuiImage
* GuiLabel
* GuiSlider
* GuiTextarea
* GuiToggle
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
